content: CFS-CID CS Closet stub Firestop cast-in accessory to use in bathtubs drains ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Accessories for firestop & fire protection- - ### FEATURES:Features Available for 3 and 4 PVC applications Can be attached to PVC pipes via solvent welding or glue Applications Cast-in device for toilet fixtures Material can be attached to PVC pipes via solvent welding or glue Available for 3 and 4 PVC applications Firestop closet stub 3 - 3-1/2 inner diameter (for use with 3 PVC pipe) Firestop closet stub 4 - 4-1/2 inner diameter (for use with 4 PVC pipe) For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2136604 - Firestop Closet Stub CFS-CID CS 3 - Package Size 12 pc - 2136605 - Firestop Closet Stub CFS-DID CS 4 - Package Size 12 pc
